Control Name: Protects Encryption Keys—Processes are in place to protect encryption keys during generation, storage, use, and destruction.

control_attributes.Control: Protects Encryption Keys—Processes are in place to protect encryption keys during generation, storage, use, and destruction.
control_attributes.SubCategory: CC6.1 The entity implements logical access security software, infrastructure, and architectures over protected information assets to protect them from security events to meet the entity’s objectives
